TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit ProfileMigrateEventArgs extends System.EventArgs
Public NotInheritable Class ProfileMigrateEventArgs Inherits EventArgs
public ref class ProfileMigrateEventArgs sealed : EventArgs

summary.span: 为 类的 事件提供数据。

span.span: Provides data for the event of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对象提供了事件信息写入事件类。The object provides event information to the event of the class. 对象提供对访问以及当前请求中的匿名配置文件的匿名用户标识符属性。The object provides access to the of the current request and the anonymous user identifier for the anonymous profile in the property. 你可以使用事件复制配置文件属性值从匿名配置文件到经过身份验证配置文件以匿名方式使用你的应用程序的用户登录时。You can use the event to copy profile property values from an anonymous profile to an authenticated profile when a user who has been anonymously using your application logs in. ASP.NET 具有启用了用户配置文件的应用程序启动时，创建类型的新类`ProfileCommon`，它继承自类。When an application that has the user profile enabled is started, ASP.NET creates a new class of type `ProfileCommon`, which inherits from the class. 当`ProfileCommon`基于在 Web.config 文件中，指定的配置文件属性生成类`GetProfile`方法将添加可用于检索`ProfileCommon`对象基于用户名称。When the `ProfileCommon` class is generated, based on the profile properties specified in the Web.config file, a `GetProfile` method is added that enables you to retrieve a `ProfileCommon` object based on a user name. 你可以使用`GetProfile`要检索的匿名配置文件的属性值的当前配置文件的方法。You can use the `GetProfile` method of the current profile to retrieve the property values of the anonymous profile. 然后，匿名属性值可以复制到经过身份验证的用户的当前配置文件中。The anonymous property values can then be copied to the current profile for the authenticated user. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示启用匿名身份验证的 Web.config 文件和ASP.NET 应用程序的 Global.asax 文件中包含的事件。The following code examples show a Web.config file that enables anonymous authentication and the event included in the Global.asax file for an ASP.NET application. 下面的代码示例演示启用匿名标识了 Web.config 文件和支持匿名用户的配置文件属性。The following code example shows a Web.config file that enables anonymous identification and profile properties that support anonymous users. ``` ``` 下面的代码示例演示ASP.NET 应用程序的 Global.asax 文件中包含的事件。The following code example shows the event included in the Global.asax file for an ASP.NET application. 事件将配置文件属性值中的匿名配置文件复制到当前用户的配置文件。The event copies profile property values from the anonymous profile to the profile for the current user. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Profile.ProfileManager#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Profile.ProfileManager/CS/global.asax#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Profile.ProfileManager#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Profile.ProfileManager/VB/global.asax#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 创建的实例类集属性设置为指定，并将设置属性设置为指定`anonymousId`。The creates an instance of the class, sets the property to the specified , and sets the property to the specified `anonymousId`.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property AnonymousID As String
public: property System::String ^ AnonymousID { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取从中迁移配置文件属性值的匿名配置文件的匿名标识符。

span.span: Gets the anonymous identifier for the anonymous profile from which to migrate profile property values.

value.span: 从中迁移配置文件属性值的匿名配置文件的匿名标识符。

span.span: The anonymous identifier for the anonymous profile from which to migrate profile property values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性包含匿名用户的唯一标识符。The property contains the unique identifier for an anonymous user. 当有人能够一直在使用你的应用程序以匿名方式记录时，你可以处理事件将复制配置文件属性值从用户的匿名配置文件复制到他或她已经过身份验证的配置文件。When someone who has been using your application anonymously logs in, you can handle the event to copy profile property values from the user's anonymous profile to his or her authenticated profile. ASP.NET 具有启用了用户配置文件的应用程序启动时，创建类型的新类`ProfileCommon`，它继承自类，并包括在 Web.config 文件中指定的配置文件属性。When an application that has the user profile enabled is started, ASP.NET creates a new class of type `ProfileCommon`, which inherits from the class and includes profile properties specified in the Web.config file. 当`ProfileCommon`生成的类，`GetProfile`方法将添加可用于检索`ProfileCommon`对象基于用户名称。When the `ProfileCommon` class is generated, a `GetProfile` method is added that enables you to retrieve a `ProfileCommon` object based on a user name. 你可以使用`GetProfile`要检索的匿名配置文件的属性值的当前配置文件的方法。You can use the `GetProfile` method of the current profile to retrieve the property values of the anonymous profile. 然后，匿名属性值可以复制到经过身份验证的用户的当前配置文件中。The anonymous property values can then be copied to the current profile for the authenticated user. 看到举例说明复制匿名属性值的第二个代码示例。See the second code example for an example of copying anonymous property values. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示启用匿名身份验证的 Web.config 文件和ASP.NET 应用程序的 Global.asax 文件中包含的事件The following code examples show a Web.config file that enables anonymous authentication and the event included in the Global.asax file for an ASP.NET application 下面的代码示例演示启用匿名标识了 Web.config 文件和支持匿名用户的配置文件属性。The following code example shows a Web.config file that enables anonymous identification and profile properties that support anonymous users. ``` ``` 下面的代码示例演示ASP.NET 应用程序的 Global.asax 文件中包含的事件。The following code example shows the event included in the Global.asax file for an ASP.NET application. 事件将配置文件属性值中的匿名配置文件复制到当前用户的配置文件。The event copies profile property values from the anonymous profile to the profile for the current user. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Profile.ProfileManager#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Profile.ProfileManager/CS/global.asax#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Profile.ProfileManager#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Profile.ProfileManager/VB/global.asax#1)]
